S06n578:1: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma-iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita evaṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni |
S06n578:2: subhūtirāha-katamāni tāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06n578:3: yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni?
S06n578:4: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-buddhā eva subhūte bhagavantaḥ,
S06n578:5: ye ca te'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvacaryākuśalāḥ,
S06n578:8: imāni tāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni |
S06n578:9: prajñāpāramitaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam |
S06n578:10: sarvā eva ca subhūte ṣaṭ pāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni |
S06n578:23: ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃvartante |
S06n578:25: atra hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā pariniṣṭhitā bhavati yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsu |
S06n578:26: ye'pi te subhūte atīte'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya parinirvṛtāḥ,
S06n578:29: ye'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06n578:32: ye'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvacintyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti,
S06n578:38: ahamapi subhūte tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ |
S06n578:42: āsu hi subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ,
S06n578:47: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭ pāramitā eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06n578:60: ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya sarvajñatāyai anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiprāptaye saṃvartante |
S06n578:63: āsu khalu punaḥ subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā,
S06n578:64: arthataśca dharmataśca nayataścopaparīkṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā paripraṣṭavyā paripraśnayitavyā |
S06n578:66: eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā saṃdarśikā avadarśikā janayitrī dhatrī |
S06n578:68: prajñāpāramitāvirahitā hi pañca pāramitā na prajñāyante,
S06n578:70: tasmāttarhi subhūte aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ||
S06n578:73: subhūtirāha-syādbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaivāsaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
S06n578:76: syātsubhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
S06n578:81: tasmāttarhi subhūte yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā viviktā śūnyā,
S06n578:91: na ca bhagavan viviktaṃ vā śūnyaṃ vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
S06n578:96: kathaṃ vā vayaṃ bhagavan asya bhāṣitasyārthamājānīmaḥ?
S06n578:99: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāre mamakāre caranti?
S06n578:103: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu ahaṃkāramamakārau śūnyau?
S06n578:106: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti?
S06n578:109: ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti |
S06n578:110: bhagavānāha-evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate |
S06n578:116: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvasattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate |
S06n578:120: evaṃ khalu subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n578:121: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate |
S06n578:122: subhūtirāha-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadidaṃ sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate |
S06n578:123: evaṃ ca bhagavaṃścaran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n578:124: evaṃ hi caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
S06n578:125: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06n578:127: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena |
S06n578:128: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati,
S06n578:131: anabhibhūtaṃ hi bhagavan buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam |
S06n578:132: anenāpi bhagavan manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet,
S06n578:136: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n578:137: evaṃ hi caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
S06n578:138: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06n578:140: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena |
S06n578:141: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati,
S06n578:144: anabhibhūtaṃ hi subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam |
S06n578:145: anenāpi subhūte manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet,
S06n578:148: sacetkhalu punaḥ subhūte ye jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ,
S06n578:152: yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto yāvajjīvaṃ sarvatathāgatān satkuryurgurukuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyurarcayeyurapacāyeyuḥ,
S06n578:155: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
S06n578:158: bhagavānāha-ataḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06n578:161: yathā yathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivaṃ viharati,
S06n578:164: tathā hi subhūte nāsti tadanyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tādṛśaṃ maitrīsahagataṃ cittam,
S06n578:170: acintyadharmasamanvāgatā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ ||
S06n578:171: kathaṃ ca subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tāvattatpuṇyamabhinirharati?
S06n578:172: tādṛśyā subhūte prajñayā samanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati,
S06n578:173: yādṛśyā prajñayā samanvāgato vadhyagatāniva sarvasattvān paśyati |
S06n578:175: sa divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokayan aprameyānasaṃkhyeyānaparimeyānaparimāṇān sattvānānantaryakarmasamanvāgatān paśyati,
S06n578:179: tasya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahān saṃvega utpadyate |
S06n578:180: te cāsya sarvasattvāstayā mahāmaitryā tayā ca mahākaruṇayā sphāritvā manasikṛtā bhavanti-ahameteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyāmi,
S06n578:182: na ca tena vā anyena vā nimittena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati |
S06n578:183: ayamapi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahān prajñāloko'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum |
S06n578:184: anena hi subhūte vihāreṇa viharanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvalokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ parigṛhṇanti,
S06n578:186: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca paribhuñjate cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān,
S06n578:188: teṣāṃ dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca dānadakṣiṇāṃ viśodhayanti |
S06n578:190: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭraṃ piṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamupadeṣṭukāmena vipulamavabhāsaṃ kartukāmena saṃsāragatān sattvān saṃsārātparimocayitukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ cakṣurviśodhayitukāmena anena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena manasikāreṇa vihartavyam |
S06n578:197: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivāni kṣapayet |
S06n578:198: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacideva puruṣeṇa maṇiratnajñāne vartamānena maṇiratnajātijñena apratilabdhapūrvaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet |
S06n578:199: sa tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato bhavet |
S06n578:202: tasya satatasamitaṃ tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ prati saṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarteran-aho batāhaṃ tena mahāmaṇiratnena viprayukta iti hi sa puruṣastasya mahāmaṇiratnasya na vismaret yāvat tadvā anyadvā tadguṇaṃ tajjātikaṃ tena mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet |
S06n578:203: evameva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāmahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭena mahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭeneva mahāmaṇiratnena ratnasaṃjñinā prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāviprayuktena prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāvirahitasarvajñatācittena tāvadanveṣṭavyā,
S06n578:204: yāvatsā vā anyā vā pratilabdhā bhavati |
S06n578:206: subhūtirāha-yatpunarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena virahitāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
S06n578:207: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahito bhavati?
S06n578:208: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ manasi karoti-sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena viviktāḥ,
S06n578:216: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
S06n578:217: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'vivardhamānayā prajñāpāramitayā bodhaye samudāgacchati,
S06n578:219: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate vā parihīyate vā |
S06n578:221: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
S06n578:226: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
S06n578:232: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate na saṃsīdati,
S06n578:239: āha-kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra prajñāpāramitāśūnyatāyāḥ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06n578:244: āha-kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyāṃ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06n578:253: āha-kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ kaścidupalabhyate,
S06n578:256: āha-kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
S06n578:261: evamukte-bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06n578:263: bhagavānāha-samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati?
S06n578:267: api nu sa eva dharma utpanno vā utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
S06n578:268: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
S06n578:270: bhagavānāha-evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntirevaṃrūpā bhavati |
S06n578:271: evaṃrūpayā ca subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n578:272: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya vaiśāradyapratipad yāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamānaḥ evaṃ vyāyacchamāno'nuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ mahāsārthavāhajñānaṃ nānuprāpsyatīti naitatsthānaṃ vidyate ||
S06n578:276: subhūtirāha-kathamasyedānīṃ bhagavan dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n578:277: bhagavānāha-kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n578:279: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛto vyākariṣyate vyākriyate vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n578:285: sarvadharmeṣu bhagavan anupalabhyamāneṣu na me evaṃ bhavati-ayaṃ dharmo'bhisaṃbudhyate,
